author: jade dragon
text: ...or not...

author: jade dragon
text: gonna try sleep, i think, even though it's been nothing but you all day...maybe i will dream instead of think

author: jade dragon
text: ...can you feel me...

author: jade dragon
text: some people are a waste of precious oxygen, honestly

author: jade dragon
text: all this art is not helping my hunger for you at all...

author: jade dragon
text: "don't say it's unholy, if i let you come hold me"

author: jade dragon
text:
literally just
the
thought

author: jade dragon
text: in need of lust or laughter...laughter it is, i suppose

author: jade dragon
text:
eyes
closed
sigh

author: jade dragon
text:
you speak to every deep
desire within
my soul

author: jade dragon
text: in need of that freezing fire tone you get that shivers my flesh

author: jade dragon
text:
to have such an exquisite easing
of all this rebellious
furious fire

author: jade dragon
text:
holy
fuck
i really
wish i was with you
right now

author: jade dragon
text:
i try to keep focus
but you are such a delicious
distraction...

author: jade dragon
text: all of this you has set me to flames

author: jade dragon
text:
take my hand
let's go start a bonfire
with every last vanity....

author: jade dragon
text:
i just
...really...
fucking want you

author: jade dragon
text:
i just want every part of your being
to touch every part of my body
the way the essence of you
has already had
every molecule of me

author: jade dragon
text:
sometimes
i don't react
cuz im afraid
to scare you off
with the intensity that is me

author: jade dragon
text:
impatiently waiting
with patient wanting
for you to claim everything me

author: jade dragon
text:
tasting
teasing
touching
feeling
falling
releasing
always im dreaming
...always of you...

author: jade dragon
text:
to feel you whisper in my ear
for you to touch
flesh rippling in response
& catching the breath
in my sighs

author: jade dragon
text:
letting feelings lead you isn't
wrong in itself
but your mind should co-pilot
